name: part_006
file: tmp_【 告知あり 】沙花叉アニソンフェス開催！2周年もありがとう！#沙花叉アニソンフェス 【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [E8HL1I2C_ZQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'only my railgun' by Sakamata Chloe.
MC section after the song performance, Sakamata Chloe thanking the audience and talking to the chat.

subtitles.original: only my railgun
subtitles.english: only my railgun

subtitles.original: 放て 心に刻んだ夢を
subtitles.english: Release the dream etched in your heart,

subtitles.original: 未来さえも置き去りにして
subtitles.english: leaving even the future behind.

subtitles.original: 限界など知らない 意味ない
subtitles.english: I know no limits, they're meaningless.

subtitles.original: この力が光散らす
subtitles.english: This power scatters light.

subtitles.original: その先に遥かな想いを
subtitles.english: Beyond that, far-reaching thoughts.

subtitles.original: 歩いてきたこの道を振り返ることしかできないなら
subtitles.english: If I can only look back at this path I've walked,

subtitles.original: 今ここで全てを壊せる
subtitles.english: I can destroy everything right here, right now.

subtitles.original: 暗闇に落ちる街並み
subtitles.english: The streets falling into darkness,

subtitles.original: 人はどこまで立ち向かえるの
subtitles.english: how far can people stand up to it?

subtitles.original: 加速するその痛みから
subtitles.english: From that accelerating pain,

subtitles.original: 誰かをきっと守れるよ
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can protect someone.

subtitles.original: Looking the blitz loop this planet to search a way
subtitles.english: Looking the blitz loop this planet to search a way

subtitles.original: Only my railgun can shoot it 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Only my railgun can shoot it, right now.

subtitles.original: 身体中を光の速さで
subtitles.english: At the speed of light through my whole body,

subtitles.original: 駆け巡った 確かな予感
subtitles.english: a certain premonition coursed through.

subtitles.original: 掴め！ 望むものなら残さず
subtitles.english: Seize it! If it's what you desire, leave nothing behind,

subtitles.original: 輝ける自分らしさで
subtitles.english: shining with your own identity.

subtitles.original: 信じてるよ あの日の誓いを
subtitles.english: I believe in the oath of that day.

subtitles.original: この瞳に光る涙
subtitles.english: Even the tears shining in these eyes,

subtitles.original: それさえも強さになるから
subtitles.english: even they will become strength.

subtitles.original: 立ち止まると少しだけ
subtitles.english: When I stop, I feel a little bit

subtitles.original: 感じる切なさに
subtitles.english: of sadness.

subtitles.original: 戸惑うことないなんて嘘はつかないよ
subtitles.english: I won't lie and say I'm never bewildered.

subtitles.original: 空に舞うコインが描く
subtitles.english: The parabola drawn by the coin

subtitles.original: 放物線が決める運命
subtitles.english: dancing in the sky decides fate.

subtitles.original: 打ち出した答えが今日も
subtitles.english: The answer I've struck out courses

subtitles.original: 私の胸を駆け巡る
subtitles.english: through my chest again today.

subtitles.original: Sparkling shiny lights awake true desire
subtitles.english: Sparkling shiny lights awake true desire

subtitles.original: Only my railgun can shoot it 必ず
subtitles.english: Only my railgun can shoot it, definitely.

subtitles.original: 貫いてく 戸惑うことなく
subtitles.english: I'll pierce through without hesitation.

subtitles.original: 傷ついても 走り続ける
subtitles.english: Even if I'm hurt, I'll keep running.

subtitles.original: 狙え！ 凛と煌く視線は
subtitles.english: Aim! My dignified and sparkling gaze

subtitles.original: 狂いなく闇を切り裂く
subtitles.english: cuts through the darkness without fail.

subtitles.original: 迷いなんて 吹き飛ばせばいい
subtitles.english: Just blow away your doubts.

subtitles.original: この心が叫ぶ限り
subtitles.english: As long as this heart screams,

subtitles.original: 誰ひとり邪魔などさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in the way.

subtitles.original: はかなく舞う無数の願いは
subtitles.english: Countless fleeting wishes

subtitles.original: この両手に積もってゆく
subtitles.english: pile up in these hands.

subtitles.original: 切り裂く闇に見えてくるのは
subtitles.english: What I see in the darkness I cut through

subtitles.original: 重く深く切ない記憶
subtitles.english: are heavy, deep, and painful memories.

subtitles.original: 色褪せてく現実に揺れる
subtitles.english: Swaying in the fading reality,

subtitles.original: 絶望には負けたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to lose to despair.

subtitles.original: 私が今私であることを胸を張って
subtitles.english: I can proudly boast that I am who I am

subtitles.original: 全て誇れる
subtitles.english: right now, and be proud of it all.

subtitles.original: Looking the blitz loop this planet to search a way
subtitles.english: Looking the blitz loop this planet to search a way

subtitles.original: Only my railgun can shoot it 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Only my railgun can shoot it, right now.

subtitles.original: 身体中を光の速さで
subtitles.english: At the speed of light through my whole body,

subtitles.original: 駆け巡った 確かな予感
subtitles.english: a certain premonition coursed through.

subtitles.original: 放て！ 心に刻んだ夢を
subtitles.english: Release it! The dream etched in your heart

subtitles.original: 未来さえも置き去りにした
subtitles.english: left even the future behind.

subtitles.original: 限界など知らない 意味ない
subtitles.english: I know no limits, they're meaningless.

subtitles.original: この力が光散らす
subtitles.english: This power scatters light.

subtitles.original: その先に遥かな想いを
subtitles.english: Beyond that, far-reaching thoughts.

subtitles.original: #沙花叉アニソンフェス
subtitles.english: #SakamataAnisongFes

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、すみません、よだれで溺れましたが、ちょっと許してください。
subtitles.english: Yes! So, sorry, I choked on my own spit, but please forgive me.

subtitles.original: えー、沙花叉アニソンフェスということで、ちょっとみんなが知っていたりとかね、
subtitles.english: Um, since this is the Sakamata Anisong Fes, I've performed some songs that everyone knows,

subtitles.original: 個人的に沙花叉が好きな曲を披露させていただきました。
subtitles.english: or that I personally like.

subtitles.original: どうだったでしょうか？みんな、いい感じだった？
subtitles.english: How was it? Was it good, everyone?

subtitles.original: ちょっとここ見てますよ。いい感じでしたか？
subtitles.english: I'm looking at the chat here. Was it good?

subtitles.original: トレンド1位も、ありがとうございます！本当にありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you for the #1 trend too! Truly, thank you.

subtitles.original: あの、よかったら、こっちかな？こっちだ。
subtitles.english: Um, if you'd like, is it this way? This way.

subtitles.original: えー、沙花叉アニソンフェスで、呟いてください。よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Please tweet with the hashtag #SakamataAnisongFes. Thank you.

subtitles.original: ホント選曲神だった？ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Was the setlist really god-tier? Thank you!

subtitles.original: あ、ということでですね、ちょっと改めてなんですけれども、えー、たくさんのね、ホロックス5人揃っての...
subtitles.english: Ah, and so, just once again, um, many... all five of HoloX together...
